ACTIVITIES

Discover endless opportunities for fun and relaxation - indulge in our exciting range of homestay activities

It's Time to Start Your Adventures

Trekking & Tour

Embark on an unforgettable adventure through the scenic trails of Darjeeling, West Bengal. Explore the breathtaking beauty of the Himalayas while trekking in Darjeeling, a paradise for nature enthusiasts. Discover panoramic vistas, lush tea gardens, and vibrant culture as you traverse the region's enchanting paths. Plan your ultimate trekking experience with our expert-guided tours and immerse yourself in the captivating wonders of Darjeeling.

Board Games

Experience the joy of board games in the charming town of Darjeeling, West Bengal. Discover a haven for board game enthusiasts, where you can indulge in strategic battles and immersive gameplay. From classic favorites to modern gems, our diverse collection guarantees endless entertainment. Join us in Darjeeling for unforgettable board game experiences that will captivate your mind and create lasting memories.

Experience

AN EVENING WALK IN NATURE WALKS
THE SOUL BACK HOME

EXPERIENCE A BEAUTIFUL DARJEELING SUNSET THROUGH A PEACEFUL FOREST WALK AS YOU ENJOY THE NATURAL BEAUTY OF A TEA ESTATE ALONG WITH THE STUNNING VIEWS AT GOLDEN HOUR.

YOU’ LL BE WELCOMED WITH OPEN ARMS AND FRIENDLY CONVERSATIONS AS WE BOND OVER SOME AUTHENTIC DARJEELING TEA, AND LEARN ABOUT LIFE THROUGH PERSONAL EXPERIENCE STORIES. WE’LL START AT A QUIET NEST (LEBONG) AND MAKE OUR WAY TOWARDS THE PICTUREQUE PANDAM TEA ESTATE, WHERE WE’LL SERVE YOU SOME PURE DARJEELING TEA AND A HEALTHY SNACK. YOU WILL BE ABLE TO SPEND SOME TIME REVELING IN THE PEACEFUL ENVIRONMENT AS THE SUN SETS AND THE STARS BEGIN TO SHINE. YOU’LL BE TREATED TO SOME GORGEOUS VIEWS OF TEA GARDENS THAT STRETCH AS FAR AS THE EYE CAN SEE. YOU CAN SEE THE VALLEY BELOW AND PERHAPS A DEEP OR TWO.

ON OUR WAY BACK, WE’LL WALK THROUGH A LOCAL VILLAGE WHERE WE’LL TREAT OURSELVES TO SOME DELICIOUS HOME COOKED MOMOS, MADE WITH LOCALLY SOURCED INGREDIENTS. THE WHOLE WALK WILL PRESENT YOU WITH SOME TRULY NSTAGRAMIC VIEWS! LED BY A LOCAL, THIS WALK WILL TAKE YOU TO SOME LESSER KNOWN LOCATION TO HELP YOU EXPERIENCE THE REAL DARJEELING. A TINY ESCAPE, NESTLED AMONG TEA GARDENS, FLOWERS, FLOATING CLOUDS, AND PURE AIR.....TRULY WILL BE A RETREAT

400/ - PER PERSON

HIKING THROUGH THE MOUNTAINS TO
RIVER VALLEY

HIKE! TAKE AN ADVANTAGE WITH YOUR FAMILY AND FRIENDS, SEE WHAT IS OFF THE TRAIL! OUR VISITORS WILL GET FIRST HAND EXPERIENCE WITH WILDLIFE, CULTURE AND HISTORY OF DARJEELING RIVER VALLEY.

WE’LL START AT A QUIET NEST (LEBONG) AND MAKE OUR WAY TOWARDS THE TEA GARDEN, PASSING THROUGH THE TEA GARDEN TO DOWN HILL TO OFF ROAD, YOU WILL BE ABLE TO SPEND SOME TIME REVELING IN THE PEACEFUL ENVIRONMENT, WE WILL PASS BY JUNGLE AND FEW LOCAL HOUSES OF HILLS, YOU’LL BE TREATED TO WALKING IN THE TEA GARDENS WITH DARJEELING TEA.

AFTER REACHING THERE WE’LL TREAT OURSELVES TO SOME DELICIOUS LOCAL FOOD & DRINKS, MADE WITH LOCALLY SOURCED INGREDIENTS. WHEN ITS TIME THE CAR WILL COME TO RIVER VALLEY AND PICK US TO OUR HOME.

THE WHOLE WALK WILL PRESENT YOU WITH SOME TRULY INSTAGRAMIC VIEWS! LED BY A LOCAL, THIS HIKE WILL TAKE YOU TO SOME LESSER KNOWN LOCATIONS TO HELP YOU EXPERIENCE THE REAL DARJEELING. YOUR FEES WILL COVER ONE HIKE, BE PREPARED TO GO OFF-TRAIL AND GET DIRTY!

1500/ - PER PERSON

Attraction Points

CHOWRASTA

Darjeeling Chowrasta is the heart of this enchanting hill station in West Bengal, India. Discover a bustling promenade lined with shops, cafes, and panoramic views of the Himalayas. Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere, indulge in local delicacies, and experience the charm of Darjeeling at its finest.

Chitre Tea Garden

Darjeeling Chitre Tea Garden, nestled in the picturesque hills of Darjeeling, is a haven for tea lovers. With its lush greenery and meticulously cultivated tea leaves, it offers a serene ambiance and the opportunity to savor world-renowned Darjeeling tea, known for its delicate flavor and unique characteristics.

Tenzing Rock

Tenzing Rock in Darjeeling is a natural rock formation that offers an exhilarating experience for adventure enthusiasts. Named after Tenzing Norgay, the first man to conquer Everest, it provides thrilling rock climbing and rappelling opportunities amidst breathtaking views of the surrounding Himalayan landscape

Tibetian Refugee center

The Darjeeling Tibetan Refugee Center is a significant cultural and historical site. It serves as a home to Tibetan refugees and showcases their rich heritage through traditional crafts, art, and a Buddhist monastery. Visitors can support the community by purchasing handicrafts and experiencing Tibetan culture firsthand
